body.name: CSK 8" Nonstick Frying Pan - Frying Pan with Natural Textured Bakelite Handle, 100% APEO & PFOA-Free Granite Coating, Stone Earth Frying Pan and Skillet Cookware, Ideal for Self-Cooking

byLineInfo.name: Visit the KOCH SYSTEME CS Store

deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
features: 🍲【Superior Quality & Unique Appearance 】Inner Aluminum alloy exterior wrapped with red marble layer, black and white spots dot the red pan surface. If you look closely, you can surprisingly see the looming fine flash. This frying pan also comes with natural textured BAKELITE Handles. Its ergonomic curvature not only makes it comfortable to hold, but also thermally insulated.

🍲【Easy To Clean & Fast Clean Up Mess】Casualness is not Messiness. It could represent quality life and gratifying cooking. This frying pan allows you to quickly clean after eating. The only thing you need is a soft sponge, then you can completely clean the frying pan by simply rinsing and wiping few times. You don’t even need to wash an extra lid.

🍲【Non-Stick Coating & Healthy Material】This stone earth frying pan is suppressed with five layers of materials. The surface stone-derived coating ensures non-stick characteristics of it. Four internal layers allow this frying pan to heat evenly and more resistant. All materials are 100% free of APEO and PFOA. Even above 1000°F, you don't need to worry about material safety.

🍲【All-Match With Foods And Four Stoves】If you own our 8 inch stone earth frying pan, then you will have a universal cookware. It is perfectly suitable for gas, ceramic, electric or induction stoves. You can also use it to cook a single egg, omelette, sausages, seafood, poultry, burgers or vegetables. So colorful culinary life for you. Only remember not to put this frying pan into the oven.

🍲【Light Weight&Suitable for Family Dinner】This KOCH SYSTEME CS non-stick cookware weighs only 1.5 pounds, which measns it won't bring much burden while you are cooking. Another advantage of light weight is convenient and easy to store. Besides, the frying pan can easily meet the cooking needs of 1-2 people, and you can also enjoy the fun of cooking with you family. This frying pan is the perfect nonstick cookware for your family's favorites.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: FOR A HEALTHY DIET KOCH SYSTEME CS was founded in the 1980s as a kitchenware brand of Carl Schmidt Sohn GmbH in Solingen, Germany. We have always focused on providing our customers with the perfect tableware and cookware. The core features of our brand's products are flexibility and personalization. Over time, KOCH SYSTEME CS has expanded more kitchenware product categories and has been sold around the world. Are you looking for a pan which could free yourself from the fastfood? Do you feel tired of the chores in the kitchen which may stop you from cooking? Or maybe you are just a newcomer in kitchen but not sure which is better? The 8 inch frying pan makes everything in the kitchen easy and efficient. Whether you are yourself for cooking or a cooking for families, this pan is the one both attractive and practical for a healthy diet.

Excellent Cuisine You can choose a variety of cooking methods to make fried steak, pasta, and other meals. A variety of ingredients can be cooked in this non-stick pan, a single egg, omelet, sausages, seafood, poultry, burgers, or vegetables. All in one makes excellent cuisine. It is also perfectly suitable for gas, ceramic, electric, or induction stoves. Only remember not to put this frying pan into the oven.

Comfortable To Hold When you try to cook with it, you hold the handle and feel the pan. Its smooth surface and curve bring a comfortable handle feel. You could easily lift the 8 inch frying pan with either of your hands. In addition, please keep the bakelite handle of the frying pan away from fire.

The frying pan with a unique appearance creates a warm and fragrant kitchen. You bring it home and you bring a happy mood before cooking, healthy meals after cooking, a clean and attractive kitchen all the time. Enjoy cooking. Enjoy the colorful life.
11" RED FRYING PAN 8" COPPER FRYING PAN 11" COPPER FRYING PAN 10"+12" SETS 10" COPPER FRYING PAN 1.5QT+3QT SAUCEPAN SET Lid ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Coating Stone Ceramic Ceramic Ceramic Ceramic Stone

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 20, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars FIRST USE IMPRESSIONS - STONE EARTH PAN. MADE IN GERMANY
reviews.reviewText: Well, I have yet to find a really durable non-stick pan, these pans all have sprayed on coatings and on every one ive ever seen the coating eventually fails - its just a question of when. The infomercials make wild claims that dont even match the pans own instructions of use, how they get away with this is baffling. They often iimpress at first use and get glowing reviews, then at some point its in the trash - to be fair this is often as much to do with improper use of metal utensils on a non stick surface as anything, but ive had pans I treated with kid gloves and still the coating failed. OK call me negative but its the truth 99.5% of the time and its something only time will tell. So, that aside I will say this pan makes a great first impression - the nice looking if not unusual coating and pan construction seem to indicate better than average quality and durability based on ther pans feel and weight as well as thickness. I especially like the very well made handle that will never burn me and looks very much like real wood but is really a man made high heat synthetic, and thats fine as long as it holds up, but the handle is one of the best ive seen far as comfort and safety go -- the down side is you can not put this pan in the oven with this type handle, and im not faulting the pan for this because the manufacturer tells you this in the instructions and I knew this going in so if you want such a pan buy one made to go in the oven. - Ive only used the pan three times so far and can not deny I am impressed, I lightly cleaned and wiped the pan dry, then fried eggs sunny side up and there was no sticking they slid out with almost no coaxing. Then with no cleaning I fried some breakfast sausage and the pan proved easy to work with and cooked the sausage nice and evenly, no sticking and the sausage came out great. Finally, leaving all the sausage remnants in the pan untouched I fried two more eggs sunny side up, and again there was no sticking the eggs slid right out with no issues - again its still early in the game but I found this very encouraging, often frying an egg after sausage makes it hard to retrieve the egg - but not in this case, in fact though I am a nonstick skeptic I already love this pan -- but I know in my heart only time will show how good a companion this pan proves to be. I would say if this pan could deliver say, five to seven years of this kind of performance its a bargain for $30, almost nothing today is built to last like things used to so the five to seven year rule is just my opinion and in todays world not many things last five to seven years, so I figure that would be a very good lifespan for a $30 non stick pan, and hopefully being made in Germany will mean something as far as build quality making it a realistic projection - but so far I have nothing bad at all to say about the pans performance or overall build quality, given what I know so far of it the $30 price seems well in line and for now I have to say its a solid performer and definitely one to try if youre looking, its not a run of the mill TV ad clone and its one of the reasons I pulled the trigger. Ive only seen the one size so far, hopefully there will be and 8 and 12 inch available, because if it proves itself good I definitely want another one or two of these pans.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Durability and charm. I love the look and the wood handles are so nice. Easy to clean.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It's wonderful and non-stick. On my gas stove though, it won't give me a rolling-boil. The bubbles are small and evenly distributed, but does take just a little longer to cool than my old stainless steel pot.I think it's because my stove's gas isn't turned up as high as it should be.I love this pot, really needed the in-between size of it. Good lid too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A year in, still like new!
reviews.reviewText: I actually came to Amazon today searching for matching pans, and realized I was remiss in not reviewing my 11" pan that I literally purchased a year ago today. I've had it a good while, and am comfortable letting the world know that it's still like brand new and easily my favorite pan of all time. Nothing sticks to it...NOTHING...it heats evenly, has a nice lid, and is SO EASY to clean. Everything just slides right out--hot water, a squirt of dish soap, a few passes with a soft sponge, and a good rinse and dry and it's ready to go back in the cabinet. I was concerned about the warnings to hand wash because, well...I'm lazy and I admit it. The rest of my pots and pans need some elbow grease to clean up, so I worried that if I couldn't put it in the dishwasher, I would just leave this pan sitting dirty on the stove in a fit of laziness. Or WORSE, that I'd say "eff it" and put it in the dishwasher and ruin it, as I've been known to do with other hand-wash items. But oh, was I wrong! 90% of the time, I put whatever I'm cooking onto a serving dish and clean off the pan before the family even sits down to our meal, it's that quick. Ask my husband and kids, every time I wash the pan I exclaim out loud how much I love it--they think it's pretty weird, but hey, I guess this is what it's like to be in your 40's.Aside from all this, as mentioned, my pan is a year old and I've seen no wear on it at all. I'm so sad to see all the reviews stating that their pans didn't even last a month! I wish that everyone could have a life-changing non-stick pan experience like mine. I stan for pan. Now I'm off to buy some other sizes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I've been using a 9.5" Kochsysteme frying pan for several years, and it has out-performed every other brand I have tried. I needed a replacement, but can no longer find the 9.5, so I went with the 5-piece set that includes a 10".Be aware that the instructions say"suitable for gas, induction, and ceramic stovetops". I did not know this at first until I open the box and saw the instructions. I have an electric element stove, so the pans don't sit entirely flat at first. When you put something in them they then lie flat, or you can use the covers included.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is the best pan I have used. Foods just lifts. Very easy to clean and the size is perfect for absolutely anything. Not too big not too small. I also own their 3 Qt pot. All come with sure lid with a wooden knob. You will not regret if you buy this item.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful and Functional
reviews.reviewText: I never really cared what my pots and pans looked like until I got this set. Now I’m going to be a cookware snob because I love these so much. They are beautiful and functional- truly non-stick. They are so easy to clean; we haven’t had to scrape at all.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great product but...
reviews.reviewText: I was alittle disappointed with the color it is a little browner than what I thought. The pans are fantastic!! But, the saucepan lid doesn't fit!! So, I called Amazon to see what options I had, as I had never bought pans before from Amazon, they told me the only option was to return the entire set. To be honest, that was alittle surprising. I thought at the very least they or the manufacturer would send out a new saucepan and/or lid. Overall the product is great!!
Really a great purchase. Went out of my way to write this review.
Me gustó mucho el producto. Lo volvería a adquirir, ya que está fabricado con material de alta calidad antiadherente

reviews.reviewTitle: Por un poco más puedes comprar algo mejor. El material es delgado
reviews.reviewText: El material de la olla es bastante delgado. Cumple su función pero nada extraordinario, la tapa y el mango bastante bien
